page.title: 18HEALTH
page.content: {Lanark}is well provided with {Health} facilities.The general health of the town is catered for by a {Health} centre,which has sucesssfully brought together the different practices in the town.{Lanark}is also fortunate to have its own {Maternity Hospital},the William Smellie.However there are proposals to do away with this hospital in the near future.{Lanark also has a small cottage {Hospital called the Lockhart.The Catholic Church also run a small {Hospital}on the outskirts of the town called St Mary's.There are also two {Hospitals} ,that cater for the disabled-the Bellfield Sanatorium and Stanmore.{ {Lanark}has several{Hospitals},that cater for the elderly-Lady Hozier,which is a recuperarting centre and Crosslaw,which looks after the elderly.
